tasks.label: Build & Run tests (g++)
tasks.command: g++ -std=c++17 -I test lasagna.cpp test/lasagna_test.cpp test/tests-main.cpp -o build/lasagna-tests && build/lasagna-tests

tasks.label: CMake: configure, build, test
tasks.command: cmake -S . -B build && cmake --build build && ctest --test-dir build --output-on-failure
